extendedInfo.description: A well known turn-based tactical war game.Play against computer AI or your friends by e-mail.Basic game controls: select unit, tap TWO! times on available hex to move, attack if possible, assign tasks to all of your units, press 'Back' key, select 'End Turn'.You can define keys in 'Options' > 'Key Bindings'.

reviews.title: Good old Battle isle
reviews.comment: Same units, just different maps. And you can move infantry out of carrier - just bind some \"key\" to that action, i.e. search button.
reviews.author: Milan Golubovi\304\207

reviews.title: Ugly port
reviews.comment: Looks like a port of some 15 years old pc game. Tiles so small it is hard to control the units
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Epic crap
reviews.comment: Locks up my Samsung Note completely, powering off and removing it. Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.author: Michael McCormack

reviews.title: \"Right clicking\"
reviews.comment: How am i supposed to \"right click\" to get my units out of vehicles? fun game other than that! Although i agree with the other people add zoom& panning

reviews.comment: Port of PC game, which itself is remake of Battle Isle. Glad to see it on Android. Give it zoom and better panning & I\'ll rate higher. Please update!

reviews.comment: Icons are too tiny to hit using fingers, frustrating, unplayable. Uninstalling. Shame, looked interesting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I am very pleased with the game. Just remember, to use more advanced actions of some units you must assign the action to a keyboard button...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I think this game has a lot of potential, everything seems to work well, and its very detailed. BUT: everything is way too small. Hard to play.

reviews.comment: And go 2 content and touch it then type in a letter and then when the personal carrier is selected type the letter and then it will give you options

reviews.comment: Give the game more than 10 min before rating.It really is an ok game.Being able to save campaigns is a must! Update that ASAP!
